steps: Pre-session: set 90-min timer, define quit rules, silence notifications
UTG opens, MP 3-bets; you fold marginal suited hand per plan
Timer ends; you quit on time and log results
BTN bluffs river vs BB and gets called
You tag the hand, breathe-reset 10 seconds, stand up for water
Return and follow checklist: reduce tables and focus on next spot
CO faces toxic chat and rising heart rate
Mute chat, table-change to softer lineup
Decision quality improves as distractions drop
